attributes.action: Independant Investigation into Retail Section of RBS/ Natwest.
attributes.additional_details:
Due to the thousands of cases of Misselling insurance policies and loans.The publicised cases of generating documents not true to the originals and generating accounts internally without customers knowledge.

 I hereby ask for a full independant investigation into the retail section of National Westminster Bank and their owners Royal Bank of Scotland.

Much has been said about the conduct of the investment side of modern banking and its effect on this country and its population. The general public are affected much more seriously by the conduct of the retail section of the bank and its practises that involve the day to day lives of individual customers.



Any member of the public who agrees with this, please sign this petition for action by the Government
